resources.string: Unlock multi freeform limits for MIUI 13 devices
You seem to be using an outdated version of LSPosed or LSPosed is not active, please update LSPosed or activate it and try again.
Unlock side-hide floating windows for supported but restricted devices
You can manage which apps can show conversation bubbles in \"System settings - Additional settings - Floating windows - Conversation bubbles - Manage conversation bubbles\"
Some notifications through Mi Push may not be supported
Make most notifications can be slide to floating window
Try to re-enable conversation bubbles service
Are you sure to restart all scope?
Multi freeform number limit has been unlocked by default
Ignore system blacklist and software prohibition of small windows
Add freeform and new task shortcut
